lines.text: Now I know you don't want to go to heaven sober... so here's one for the road.
If a man can't go out in a blaze of glory, he can at least go with dignity.
Well, I don't feel like going!
Every time you shoot at someone, plan on dying.
A word of advice - don't mistake stupidity for courage.
[the gang is arguing about what to "name" Isaiah]
Hey, I broke him, I'll name him!
